name: 警備Ａ
message: "Hey!"
Guards swarm us from every direction. They must've been waiting to ambush us.

name: 紅雀
message: "Never a break, huh?"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Outta the way, assholes!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "Coming through!"
Without a moment's hesitation, the Beni-Shigures throw themselves at the guards.
Koujaku and I are surrounded too.
The floor is shaking and I can hear explosions high above. We're almost out of time.

name: 紅雀
message: "Stand back, Aoba."
Koujaku takes a step forward and readies his sword.

name: 紅雀
message: "Blink and you'll miss it."
Grinning savagely, Koujaku swings his blade in a wide arc.

name: 紅雀
message: "Orryyyyaaahhhhhhhhhh!!!"

name: 警備Ｂ
message: "Woah!"

name: 警備Ｃ
message: "Wha―!"
The broad slash mows down the guards, pushing back those it doesn't knock out.

name: 紅雀
message: "You guys, move!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "R-Right, boss!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Uryah!"
As soon as his men disengage with their guards, he swings his sword again.
The guards collapse like ragdolls.

name: 警備Ａ
message: "Guh!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Hell yeah! Clean sweep! Don't worry, you'll live!"
I watch, awestruck, as Koujaku mows down the guards with a smile.
The guy is just... amazing.
Even now, he's still Koujaku, the guy who jumps in without a second thought, who always has your back no matter what.
It's just like watching him beat up bullies back when we were kids.
He hasn't changed. Not one bit.

name: 紅雀
message: "...Alright!"
Koujaku only stops when not a single guard is standing.

name: 紅雀
message: "Let's get outta here, guys!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Right behind you, boss!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah!"
The shaking is getting worse and the explosions are getting closer.
We make a beeline for the entrance.

name: 紅雀メンバーＢ
message: "We... We made it!"

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "Sweet air!"
Once we're a good distance away from the tower, we turn around to look.
The top portion of the tower has collapsed, a plume of black smoke rising into the sky.
Even from here, I can see the building shaking.

name: 紅雀
message: "It's not safe here. We should keep running."
Koujaku leads me away by the arm. I look back over my shoulder.
With the collapse of Oval Tower, Platinum Jail is finished. Toue's plans are in ruins.
I still don't know why it collapsed, but something... something nags.
Those messages from the "Damsel in Distress." That game that seemed to foretell the future.
I assumed it was a trap.
But what if... What if something in the tower was guiding us all along?
Absurd, I know... but I can't shake the thought.
